channel.title: CVE Feed for MicroEngine Inc. -- MicroEngine Mailform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MicroEngine Inc. -- MicroEngine Mailform

item.title: CVE-2023-27397|2023-05-23T00:00:00 -- microengine%20inc. -- microengine%20mailform
item.description: Unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type exists in MicroEngine Mailform version 1.1.0 to 1.1.8. If the product's file upload function and server save option are enabled, a remote attacker may save an arbitrary file on the server and execute it.

item.title: CVE-2023-27507|2023-05-23T00:00:00 -- microengine%20inc. -- microengine%20mailform
item.description: MicroEngine Mailform version 1.1.0 to 1.1.8 contains a path traversal vulnerability. If the product's file upload function and server save option are enabled, a remote attacker may save an arbitrary file on the server and execute it.
